experience.title: Scrum Master and Software Tester Intern
responsibilities: Assisted the technical and business staff with the design, testing and maintenance of new deployment on a weekly basis.
Performed automated and manual tests to ensure the software created by developers is up to date and working seamlessly.
Detected and tracked software bugs and inconsistencies in the application and have an in-depth understanding of Agile principles and methodologies.
Strong facilitation skills to lead Scrum ceremonies (Daily Standups, Sprint Planning, Sprint Review, Sprint Retrospective).

projects.title: Trello-Clone
description: Created a Trello-inspired platform facilitating the organization of tasks, complete with functions to generate new cards, seamlessly rearrange them via drag-and-drop, and projected visually indicate the status of each card.
Incorporated a click option card seamlessly redirects users to a dedicated page displaying its title, status, and description.

projects.title: Java Spring Boot
description: Implemented React and Spring Boot to build a simple CRUD Application.
Build a REST API on Courses and Topics using Spring Boot Application and tested on Postman.

projects.title: Blog Website
description: Developed a dynamic multi-page website using Front-end technologies that showcases blogs from different users and provides a feature to upload our blogs.
Includes an Admin panel which controls the contents of blog and user access.

certifications.title: The Bits and Bytes of Computer Networking
